meanings.definition: A cell containing two or more genetically different nuclei.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study heterokaryons to learn about how different nuclei interact.
meanings.sent2: The heterokaryons formed in the lab showed unique genetic combinations.
meanings.sent3: The heterokaryons at the science fair were a colorful mix of nuclei.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, heterokaryons are like a genetic puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, heterokaryons look like tiny worlds with diverse populations.

meanings.definition: The result of the fusion of two or more different types of cells.
meanings.sent1: The heterokaryons in the experiment displayed characteristics of both parent cells.
meanings.sent2: Researchers observed the formation of heterokaryons under specific conditions.
meanings.sent3: At the cell party, the heterokaryons were the life of the fusion dance.
meanings.sent4: Heterokaryons symbolize unity in diversity within the cellular world.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of heterokaryons lies in their ability to merge distinct cell types.
